title: [Stillson's Weaponry]
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the honey gold oak walls, and an oak beam ceiling rises overhead.  A polar bear rug sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a large brass-bound chest on one side of the shop and a narrow glass-topped table on the other.

A dragon-shaped mithril buckler hangs on one of the honey gold oak walls, and an oak beam ceiling rises overhead.  A polar bear rug sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a large brass-bound chest on one side of the shop and a narrow glass-topped table on the other.
